name: Revenge Of Johny 5
description:
With a theme of Surprisingly Spooky, we made a Revenge Of Johny 5. Team was John Weightman, Tim Weightman, Will Dixon and Luke Garside.

Roles:

John Weightman - AI Developer & Narrative Director

Tim Weightman - 3D Artist

Will Dixon - Lead Level Designer/VFX Artist, Artistic Lead & Assistant AI Programmer

Luke Garside - Lead Audio Director

Navigate an abandoned lab, sneaking around a ruthless murdering robot and collecting parts of an EMP, putting an end to his rampage. Uncover the mystery behind what happened to the staff, and how they met their gruesome ends.

Controls:

          WASD - Move around

          Mouse - To look around & interact/escape robot when caught
